overview:
Herman Daems is Chairman of the Board of Directors. He is an associate professor in Strategic Management at Katholieke Universiteit Leuven (Belgium). He was a visiting professor at Harvard Business School and has been Chairman of the European Private Equity & Venture Capital Association (EVCA).

Currently, Herman Daems is a director of CoWare, Domo Chemicals, Vanbreda Risk & Benefits and Efico, chairman of the Board of Directors of Barco and of IPEV, an international consultation body that defines valuation standards for Private Equity and Venture Capital. He is also a member of the Executive Committee of the Federation of Enterprises in Belgium (VBO-FEB).
